Hacking a better world

The New Domain51

Welcome to the Domain51.com. I've revamped the site to bring it up-to-date with what we're working on. I've also migrated the site over to Jekyll (my fork), which I highly recommend for basic sites.

There's a lot more that I plan to add (including comments to these blog posts), but those aren't necessary to get this out the door. So this qualifies as the release-early, release-often. Watch for more changes.

Posted by Travis Swicegood
Originally published on Sunday, October 25th, 2009
